author: bculberson
content: As the gas limit is increased, the chance for an uncle goes up… That’s the only reason I can think of for a miner to not fill the block.  If there is good mev in the bundle it’s probably not worth the tips to include the rest.

author: pietjepuk
content: (see https://notes.ethereum.org/@barnabe/rk5ue1WF_  on this exact topic discussed a few months ago)

author: perama
content:
I don't know if Goerli data can be classified as "actual market data", but if anyone wants to backtest a fee recommendation algorithm, this is some fee data from London until now.

https://gist.github.com/perama-v/83678d2cd300e19cd6a9e1f04e809947

author: bculberson
content: this analysis was done pre 1559... it will look quite different with tips of 1 gwei

author: pietjepuk
content: You might want to check that again, this is exactly the topic that came up to discuss the needed miner fee for EIP-1559 transactions
